title: Atlassian | SSE | Offer
content:
Education: Tier 1
Years of Experience: 9
Previous Comp : 50 LPA + ESOPs
Prior Experience: Startups
Date of the Offer: August 2024
Company: Atlassian
Title/Level: P50, Senior Software Engineer
Location: Remote
Base Salary: 65 LPA + 3.6 EPF
Signing Bonus: 10 LPA
Stock bonus: $25K per year
Bonus: 15% Performance bonus
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 1.03 Cr 
Benefits: Standard Atlassian Benefits

Please recommend as per your experience.
